sentences.en: Accepting it with one hand shows disinterest, disrespect and carelessness.
sentences.cn: 接受它一方面显示对, 不尊重和不小心.

sentences.en: Betty : Don't disrespect me just because you're not.
sentences.cn: 不要因为你没结婚,就不尊重我.

sentences.en: Cheapening oneself only incurs more disrespect from others.
sentences.cn: 发贱只能使别人更加地不尊重你.

sentences.en: Damien has always had a healthy disrespect (= that you think is good ) for media opinion.
sentences.cn: 达米安对媒体的观点从来都持合理的不以为然的态度。

sentences.en: He meant no disrespect by that remark, ie did not mean to be rude.
I meant no disrespect for your traditions.
sentences.cn: 我并无蔑视你们传统的意思.

sentences.en: It was said on the spur of the moment and I meant no disrespect to anybody.
sentences.cn: 我一时冲口而出，无意冒犯任何人。

sentences.en: Katherine : Don't disrespect this class just because you're married.
sentences.cn: 不要以为你结婚了,就不尊重这堂课.

sentences.en: Lara: What was it that you said? Disrespect is the route to carelessness?
sentences.cn: [你自己说过什么来着? 失礼会导致失误的. ]

sentences.en: Let me say this. I meant no disrespect to you or her. "
sentences.cn: 让我把这一点说明一下, 我刚才对你或对她若有失札之处,可并不是有意的. ”

sentences.en: Mary: How dare you speak to me with such disrespect!
sentences.cn: 玛丽: 你怎麽敢这样和我说话,太无礼了!

sentences.en: No disrespect to John Beck, but the club has been happier since he left.
sentences.cn: 我对约翰·贝克绝无不敬之意，但自他离开后俱乐部气氛的确更活跃了。

sentences.en: No disrespect to Phil, but the team has performed better since he left (= used to show you are not criticizing someone ) .
sentences.cn: 我无意对菲尔不敬，不过自从他离开后球队表现更好了。

sentences.en: Tell them their days of disrespect are through.
sentences.cn: 告诉小牛,你们嚣张的日子过去了.

sentences.en: The pay's the same but people will disrespect you less.
sentences.cn: 薪水不变,但人们会更加尊重你.

sentences.en: This isn't a sign of disrespect in any way.
sentences.cn: 这不是不尊重别人的表现.

sentences.en: Throughout life people will make you mad , Disrespect you, treat you bad.
sentences.cn: 将会让你很痛苦但是不要一蹶不振, 女孩.

sentences.en: True irreverence is disrespect for another man's god.
sentences.cn: 真正的大不敬是不尊重别人的神.

words.tran_cn: 无礼的；失礼的；不尊敬的

trans.tran_en: lack of respect for someone or something
